alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 5:27PM CDT until May 08 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rolla, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rolla. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 186. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
